snippet: The police say there are a couple of bandits making a living by stealing from Midtown towers, but only after they provide identification.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes exploits of Balfourd Ayala, burglar with lengthy history of stealing items from Midtown Manhattan office buildings, often after showing ID at front desk first.
lead_paragraph: The police say there are a couple of bandits making a living by stealing from Midtown towers, but only after they provide identification.

headline.seo: Suspected of Burglaries, but Not of Using False ID
headline.main: Suspected of Burglaries at Office Buildings, but Not of Using a False ID
headline.print_headline: Suspected of Burglaries at Office Buildings, but Not of Using a False ID
